about_the_game:
Elevate the presence of your units in Millennia with the exclusive Wolfpack Warband and Eagle Archers clothing.

Available instantly with the Expansion Pass, this clothes pack unlocks unique wolf skin clothing for your Warband. Your Archer Unit receives eagle-inspired clothes, symbolizing their precision and keen sight.

Instant, exclusive access when buying the Expansion Pass
detailed_description:
Elevate the presence of your units in Millennia with the exclusive Wolfpack Warband and Eagle Archers clothing.

Available instantly with the Expansion Pass, this clothes pack unlocks unique wolf skin clothing for your Warband. Your Archer Unit receives eagle-inspired clothes, symbolizing their precision and keen sight.

Instant, exclusive access when buying the Expansion Pass
